info.name: LowKey JukePop
info.description: Remove images, bright colors, and sidebars from JukePop for less distractions while reading. The navigation bar at the top disappears until a user hovers over or taps that part of the screen. Comments have been moved to the bottom of story chapters.
info.additionalInfo:
Updated 201604015

v0.6 - 20160415, Made it a lighter theme, tweaked width of submission form for chapters.
v0.5 - 20150702, Added opacity change on hover of navbar, modified JP30
v0.4 - Modified discovery pages to match overall style
v0.3 - Modified color scheme to be darker and tweaked sizing
v0.2 - Initial modifications of sizing and areas of style changes
v0.1 - 20150619, Initial creation of style
